document_data.name: Purdynkul Baerlbohun
document_data.mainbody: '''Purdynkul Baerlbohun''' was the eldest son of [[Unsible Baerlbohun]], the "Mad Toymaker," who rose to wealth and prominence in [[Athkatla]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Purdynkul lived in the city's affluent [[Athkatla/Gem District|Gem District]] in a famously gaudy monstrosity of a mansion known as the [[Baerlbohun House]] along with his father and siblings. Purdynkul was a large and waddling man known for his laziness, the trait he shared with his brothers.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] Purdynkul's eager socialite sister [[Arisrathra Baerlbohun]] was the most well-known member of the [[Baerlbohun]] family after Unsible, the patriarch.
